004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTable;
008import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTableEntry;
009import java.util.HashMap;
010import java.util.Map;
011
012/**
013 * Root Mechanism2d node.
014 *
015 * <p>Do not create objects of this class directly! Obtain instances from the {@link
016 * Mechanism2d#getRoot(String, double, double)} factory method.
017 *
018 * <p>Append other nodes by using {@link #append(MechanismObject2d)}.
019 */
020public final class MechanismRoot2d {
021  private final String m_name;
022  private NetworkTable m_table;
023  private final Map<String, MechanismObject2d> m_objects = new HashMap<>(1);
024  private double m_x;
025  private NetworkTableEntry m_xEntry;
026  private double m_y;
027  private NetworkTableEntry m_yEntry;
028
029  /**
030   * Package-private constructor for roots.
031   *
032   * @param name name
033   * @param x x coordinate of root (provide only when constructing a root node)
034   * @param y y coordinate of root (provide only when constructing a root node)
035   */
036  MechanismRoot2d(String name, double x, double y) {
037    m_name = name;
038    m_x = x;
039    m_y = y;
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Append a Mechanism object that is based on this one.
044   *
045   * @param <T> The object type.
046   * @param object the object to add.
047   * @return the object given as a parameter, useful for variable assignments and call chaining.
048   * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if the object's name is already used - object names must
049   *     be unique.
050   */
051  public synchronized <T extends MechanismObject2d> T append(T object) {
052    if (m_objects.containsKey(object.getName())) {
053      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Mechanism object names must be unique!");
054    }
055    m_objects.put(object.getName(), object);
056    if (m_table != null) {
057      object.update(m_table.getSubTable(object.getName()));
058    }
059    return object;
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Set the root's position.
064   *
065   * @param x new x coordinate
066   * @param y new y coordinate
067   */
068  public synchronized void setPosition(double x, double y) {
069    m_x = x;
070    m_y = y;
071  }
072
073  void update(NetworkTable table) {
074    m_table = table;
075    m_xEntry = m_table.getEntry("x");
076    m_yEntry = m_table.getEntry("y");
077    flush();
078    for (MechanismObject2d obj : m_objects.values()) {
079      obj.update(m_table.getSubTable(obj.getName()));
080    }
081  }
082
083  public String getName() {
084    return m_name;
085  }
086
087  private void flush() {
088    if (m_xEntry != null) {
089      m_xEntry.setDouble(m_x);
090    }
091    if (m_yEntry != null) {
092      m_yEntry.setDouble(m_y);
093    }
094  }
095}
